panels.description: RTT percentiles over time grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  series,
  value_ms
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | p50') AS series,
    quantileTDigest(0.50)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | p95') AS series,
    quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | p99') AS series,
    quantileTDigest(0.99)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
)
ORDER BY time, series

panels.title: RTT percentiles (p50/p95/p99)

panels.description: SLO threshold breach rate over time grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  series,
  pct
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | >1s') AS series,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 1000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | >2s') AS series,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 2000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), ' | >5s') AS series,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 5000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
    AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
  GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
)
ORDER BY time, series

panels.title: Tail breach rate by SLO threshold

panels.description: Maximum RTT anomaly view grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  concat(swarmId, ' | ', if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId), ' | ', if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode)) AS segment,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY time, swarmId, callId, businessCode
ORDER BY time, segment

panels.title: Max RTT by transaction segment (anomaly view)

panels.description: Worst latency groups in the selected time range, grouped by swarmId, callId, and businessCode.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  swarmId,
  if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId) AS call_id,
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS business_code,
  count() AS txns,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_rtt_ms,
  quantileTDigest(0.99)(processorDurationMs) AS p99_rtt_ms,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms,
  avg(processorSuccess) * 100 AS processor_success_pct,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS business_success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  AND match(if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode), '${businessCode:regex}')
GROUP BY swarmId, call_id, business_code
ORDER BY max_rtt_ms DESC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Worst callId/businessCode by RTT

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY swarmId
list.label: Swarm
list.name: swarm
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY swarmId

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) AND callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
list.label: Call ID
list.name: callId
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) AND callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 500
list.label: Business Code
list.name: businessCode
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime) ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 500
